entry.title: Researcher Can't Find Men Who Have Not Seen Porn

blockquote.p: A new study on the effects of pornography has just started, but there is already one revealing find: the researcher could not find any men who have not viewed pornography.
"We started our research seeking men in their twenties who had never consumed pornography. We couldn't find any," said Simon Louis Lajeunesse, a professor at the University of Montreal.

div.p: from "Researcher Can't Find Men Who Have Not Seen Porn"
